text:
Raskolnikov's Decision

Dim room, tension thickens.
Raskolnikov: "Leave me alone. I want to be alone."  
Pulcheria: "Rodya, please, come back to us!"  
Dounia: "What are you doing to mother?"

---

Hallway, footsteps echo.
Dounia: "Brother, you’re hurting her!"  
Raskolnikov: "No matter, I’ll come back."  

---

Outside, urgency in the air.
Razumihin: "He’s mad! You must see it!"  
Dounia: "Wicked, heartless egoist!"  
Razumihin: "I’ll be back. Stay here!"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov expresses a desire to be alone and cut ties with his family, fearing that their love will lead to hatred.
